name: Pinkmaniac
description:
Short visual novel game made in renpy  for my final project of my 1st year uni.

Now only in Thai but maybe in the future i will add English 

It's very short but I hope you enjoy it !

There are 3 different endings  and 2 different CGs you can get * , Don't stop playing until you get an "unlocked all" message!

Warning :  Flashing lights , Slight Horror , jumpscare 

If you like it pls support my twitter @lilizzii , you can donate there!
